title: Typeface Similar to Digital
content:
I'm trying to figure out what typeface is used for this logo. It's similar to Digital, but the S and M are obviously different.

Your help is appreciated. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140404083912im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-04-05%20at%2012_4291.20.40%20AM.PNG)
author: sethta

comments.content:
After doing more searching, I found the answer to my own question.

http://www.dafont.com/suzuki.font?fpp=50&af=on&text=SEMPER+FI

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140404083912im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-04-05%20at%2012_4876.35.34%20AM.PNG)
